alterego_mod:Birthday.NAME: Birthday
alterego_mod:Birthday.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw a card. Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Venus.NAME: Venus
alterego_mod:Venus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
alterego_mod:Venus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

alterego_mod:Swimsuit.NAME: Swimsuit
alterego_mod:Swimsuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Vulnerable and !M! Frail.

alterego_mod:Belts.NAME: Belts
alterego_mod:Belts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain X Block. Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Belts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2X Block. Exhaust.

alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.NAME: Presence Concealment
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X+2 turns.
